text: Nde nan phorgav Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi, Fhe Bakɨme nden kamgi, nde bɨkbɨɨgip kɨri. Nde bɨkbɨɨgi, kɨv khueŋ ndɨkndɨgɨ thari, “Nza ntige bɨkbɨɨgi, nza wari won ndava vhura tɨvi zɨn ŋgɨrga.” Zakɨra fhuvara! Nde mba ndɨkndɨgar muuŋ thari. Nde bevbevira, nde Fhe Bakɨmen gumgi gu mbigi, nde fhura mben ŋaara gumgi kɨv, nde wari won ndavir mben nɨɨŋgiri.
